channel.title: Comments on: The Hardest Lessons for Startups to Learn

item.title: By: Julian Ellison
item.dc:creator: Julian Ellison
item.description: I'd certainly be pleased to explain how I came by some of my grey hair.
item.content:encoded: I’d certainly be pleased to explain how I came by some of my grey hair.

item.title: By: James Corbett
item.dc:creator: James Corbett
item.description: Yes, I think there's great demand for a startup school and I second Paul's vote that it could be done as an unconference - great idea!
item.content:encoded: Yes, I think there’s great demand for a startup school and I second Paul’s vote that it could be done as an unconference – great idea!

item.title: By: Paul Browne
item.dc:creator: Paul Browne
item.description: You could do it as an 'unconference'.
